task.title: Setting bucket priority (UI)
task.shortdesc: The bucket disk I/O priority is set via the Data Bucket panel either when creating a data bucket or when editing a data bucket.

context.p: To set Bucket disk I/O priority:

step.cmd: Navigate to Data Buckets > Create New Bucket (new bucket) or Data Buckets > bucket_name link > Edit (existing bucket).
In the Disk I/O Optimization panel, set bucket disk I/O priority option. Specify either High or Low to set. Low is the default.
